parameters: That was a close one, I better not take any more
need to trigger boss fight here.
Self Switch: A B C D
Self Switch: A B C D
Self Switch: A B C D
The bed is extremely worn down.
Something tells you that being held here was not pleasant.
A foul odor hits your face the second you peer in.
Based on the colour and smell of the substance within,
The pillow is harder than a rock.
Based on the imprint left on the stool,
The leg on this side is splintered
This pillow is stained in a multitude of colours,
on top of being as hard as a rock.
You rather sleep on the floor than be near this bed.
There are various red marks on the broken hourglass.
The highest scratch is around the 15 minute mark.
There noticable cracks on this skeleton's femurs.
None of its fingers are attached either.
They really didnt like whoever this was.
Wooden spikes protrude through this skeleton's feet.
It appears as if this victim was set to hang,
but purposely not put high enough.
He gazes at you with a dark smirk.
He takes a seat on the stool and waits!
